metadata.title: CVE-2024-38474 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Substitution encoding issue in mod_rewrite in Apache HTTP Server 2.4.59 andearlier allows attacker to execute scripts indirectories permitted by the configuration but not directly reachable byanyÂ URL or source disclosure of scripts meant to only to be executed asCGI.Users are recommended to upgrade to version 2.4.60, which fixes this issue.Some RewriteRules that capture and substitute unsafely will now fail unlessrewrite flag "UnsafeAllow3F" is specified.

criterions.comment: apache2 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
